The pure class interface. 
public class FormatBeneath
  extends CompoundFormat
This is a compound Format class for component Format texts that should be printed beneath each other. Thus, it has exactly the default behaviour as described under CompoundFormat (see there).

Author:
Jacob Wieland (ughosage@cs.tu-berlin.de)
See also:
CompoundFormat, Format
